BG3 Hexblade Features Progression

Gain Martial Weapons, Medium armour and Shields Proficiency Bind Hexed Weapon: Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become Proficient with it if you weren't already. When you attack with this weapon, there is a chance that Hexblade's Curse will be applied to the target. You can only have 1 pact weapon at any time and it uses your Charisma modifier.
